scenario.sendMessageHTTP: GET http://[httpServerURL]/web/guest/home/ HTTP/1.1 Accept: image/gif, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, image/pjpeg, application/x-shockwave-flash, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, application/xaml+xml, application/x-ms-xbap, application/x-ms-application, */* Accept-Language: fr User-Agent: IMSloader 5.1 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Proxy-Connection: Keep-Alive Host: [httpServerURL]
